title: Mastering Australian Tax Law: An Expert-Level Course Utilizing Visual Mnemonics

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customized training for local Australian corporate tax management practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately reproduce the three core concepts of Australian tax law (taxable income calculation, deductible items, tax rate structure) using visual mnemonics with at least 90% accuracy
Reduce the PIC (Net Income Calculation) error rate to below 20% in a tax simulation project based on real-world cases
Analyze practical changes arising from tax law revisions in an infographic format following a three-stage process

resources: Case Collection (Tax Cases in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
